ygData.subject: Re: Re: What to buy?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hmmm... a wise comment... perhaps I will look into that. While they are rarer and MUCH more expensive, I would recomend people also look into Obsidian Bead
ygData.messageBody:
Clarity wrote:
>
> From: Clarity <roderick.duncan@...>
>
> Gold Topaz Earrings ac3 8vsDisease
>
> Actually it's the 3ac from the earrings that's the important bit.
> I'll
> take 3ac over 4str any time. And these earrings will only cost you
> 1/3 of the cost of electrum sapphire earrings.
>
> Clarity Harvestmoon,
> Karana
>
> >Personally I would prefer the +4str +2int earrings over the disease
> >resistances... diseases aren't that big of a deal
> >
> >--
> >
> >Hammeron
> >Monk of Quellious
> >Karana

Hmmm... a wise comment... perhaps I will look into that.

While they are rarer and MUCH more expensive, I would recomend people
also look into Obsidian Bead Hoops, I have a pair in bank, 2ac +3 AGI
+3INT, ends up giving you 6ac on ears because of the AGI. I might start
wearing them especially when I get my Bracer of Erollisi

I currently have 2 Vox Bracers (picked 1 up for 150pp, other for 105pp)
and 2 Serp Bracers... getting an Erollisi soon, what combination of
these should I use? I will be using them in conjunction with Obsidian
Bead Hoops

Thanks

--

Hammeron
Monk of Quellious
Karana
